name: The Den of Worms (itch)
description:
The Den of Worms is an experimental open world RPG that borrows many gameplay elements from different games. You must enter the Astral Plane to save your dreams, and what you will find is a world fading away into rot and decay. By planting flowers and hatching worm eggs NPCS will return to the Astral Plane and help guide your progress. Gameplay is a mix between Zelda and Animal Crossing. 

There are two difficulty modes, explorer and gamer. In explorer mode, most enemies don't attack you and it is a lot easier to progress. In gamer mode, you will have to navigate through the monsters such as ghouls and skeletons. 

Zones: Byrd Town, Forest, Ocean Town, Swamps, Volcano Town, Oasis Town, Underworld. 

Over 40 Quests

Unique clothing and weaponry hidden in the world

Lots to explore and discover
